userType: You have to select who the submission applies to
socialSecurityNo: Norwegian national identification number / d-number is not valid
socialSecurityNoIsEmpty: You have to fill in your Norwegian national identification number / d-number
firstName: You have to fill in your first name
lastName: You have to fill in your last name
streetName: You have to fill in the street address
postalCode: You have to fill in zip code
city: You have to fill in city
country: You have to fill in country
otherDocumentation: You have to fill in what documentation you want to send to NAV
subjectOfSubmission: You have to choose topic for the submission
navUnitContact: You have to state whether you have been in contact with NAV about this matter previously
navUnitContactSelect: You have to select which NAV unit you have been in contact with
navUnit: You have to choose which NAV unit will receive the submission
